actions.name: GetTelemetryEvaluationStatus
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the Telemetry Config feature status for the account

actions.name: GetTelemetryEvaluationStatusForOrganization
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the Telemetry Config feature status for the organization

actions.name: ListResourceTelemetry
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve telemetry configurations for resources associated with the account

actions.name: ListResourceTelemetryForOrganization
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve telemetry configurations for resources associated with accounts in the organization

actions.name: StartTelemetryEvaluation
actions.description: Grants permission to start the Telemetry Config feature for the account

actions.name: StartTelemetryEvaluationForOrganization
actions.description: Grants permission to start the Telemetry Config feature for the organization

actions.name: StopTelemetryEvaluation
actions.description: Grants permission to stop the Telemetry Config feature for the account

actions.name: StopTelemetryEvaluationForOrganization
actions.description: Grants permission to stop the Telemetry Config feature for the organization
